```{r Load Libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
head(mpg)
```

---

Visualize
```{r Vsiualization, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
mpg %>%
  ggplot(aes(cty, fill = drv)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.3) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(
    title = "City Mileage by Drive Type",
    x = "City Mileage (mpg)",
    fill = "Drive Type"
  ) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)
  )

# save your plot
ggsave("mpg plot.png",
       width = 12,
       height = 7,
       units = "cm",
       dpi = 300)

```
